name: Rigoberta Menchú
description: Guatemalan human rights activist, Nobel Peace Prize winner, and advocate for indigenous peoples' rights
philosophy: Peace cannot exist without justice, justice cannot exist without fairness, fairness cannot exist without development, development cannot exist without democracy, democracy cannot exist without respect for the identity and rights of cultures and peoples.
quotes: We are not myths of the past, ruins in the jungle, or zoos. We are people and we want to be respected
The cost of peace is much less than the cost of war
I would like to be remembered as a person who brought hope to her people
